pages.text: $(li)Pumpkin Seeds can be plant in Farmland to generate a Pumpkin.$(br)$(li)They can be crafted placing a Pumpkin or Large Pumpkin Slice in a Crafting Table.

$(li)Pumpkin Seeds can be used to tame Parrots and Crows.$(br)$(li)You can use Pumpkin Seeds to craft a Seed Pouch in a Crafting Table too.$(br)$(li)Finally you can put Pumpkin Seeds in a Composter to generate Bone Meal.
